name: Garlic Soy Chicken Breast
description: Indulge in the savory and aromatic Garlic Soy Chicken Breast, a perfect dish for those who love high-protein and low-carb meals. Made with a delectable blend of spices, low sodium soy sauce, and coconut aminos, this recipe promises a tender and flavorful chicken breast that aligns with a healthy lifestyle. Perfect for anyone following a diet that appreciates the essence of quality ingredients without compromising on taste.
recipeIngredient: 600 g Chicken breast, raw, with skin

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: Finely chop the ginger and garlic cloves. Measure out all other ingredients as per the list.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the low sodium soy sauce, coconut aminos, garlic granules, chopped ginger, and chopped garlic. Season with black pepper and salt to create the marinade.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chicken breasts in a suitable marinating dish and pour the marinade over the chicken. Ensure each piece is well-coated. Add the bay leaves to the dish. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, preferably overnight, to marinate.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the marinated chicken breasts to a baking tray. Evenly distribute pieces of butter on top of each chicken breast.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked and juices run clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy your delicious and healthy Garlic Soy Chicken Breast.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
